pullrequest.title: Upload brew bottles to non versioned destination in S3

content.raw: in [branch upload_bottles_to_canonical_scpeters](#!/osrf/release-tools/branches/compare/upload_bottles_to_canonical_scpeters%0Dupload_bottles_to_canonical#diff) I propagated this change to two other scripts and changed the sed separator from `:` to `@` since `:digit:` already has `:` characters. Feel free to pick and choose these changes.
content.html: in branch upload_bottles_to_canonical_scpeters I propagated this change to two other scripts and changed the sed separator from : to @ since :digit: already has : characters. Feel free to pick and choose these changes.
